analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
